#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int test;
    cin >>test;
    for(int z =1; z <= test;z++)
    {
        int n;
        cin >>n;
        vector<int> v,u;
        int x=n;
        while (x)
        {
            v.push_back(x%2);
            x/=2;
        }
        reverse(v.begin(),v.end());
        if(n==1)
        {
            cout<<0<<endl;
            continue;
        }
        if(!(n&(n-1)))
        {
            cout<<v.size()-2<<endl;
            continue;
        }
        int ones=0;
        for(int i =0; i < v.size();i++)
            if(v[i])ones++;
        int siz = v.size();
        int res = 2000000;
        int alreadyOnes=1;
        for(int i =1; i < siz;i++)
        {
            if(v[i])
            {
                res = min(res,max(siz+alreadyOnes-2,ones-alreadyOnes+siz-i-2));
                alreadyOnes++;
            }
        }
        cout<<res<<endl;
    }
}
